artfilter: You can select from the following Art Filters
aperturepriority: You set the aperture manually, and the camera     sets the shutter speed automatically.
iauto: A full auto mode in which the camera automatically optimizes     settings for the current scene. The Live Guide lets you make creative     adjustments, and view them on the monitor before you take the shot.
scenemodes: You can select from the following Scene Modes
manual: You set the shutter speed and aperture manually.
shutterpriority: You set the shutter speed manually between     1/8000 to 60 seconds or Bulb, and the     camera sets the aperture automatically.
